alert.note: Alert for Ellis; Harper; Woods; Woodward (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued February 26 at 7:09PM CST until February 26 at 7:45PM CST by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Ellis County in northwestern Oklahoma... Northwestern Woods County in northwestern Oklahoma... Southeastern Harper County in northwestern Oklahoma... Woodward County in northwestern Oklahoma... * Until 745 PM CST. * At 709 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located 5 miles northwest of Fargo, moving northeast at 90 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Woodward, Mooreland, Gage, Fargo, Fort Supply, Freedom, Sharon, Alabaster Caverns State Park, Harmon, Tangier and Camp Houston. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect for the warned area. Tornadoes can develop quickly from severe thunderstorms. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
